Package com.ibm.eznosql.options

Class DatabaseOptions.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.eznosql.options.DatabaseOptions.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    DatabaseOptions
    public static class DatabaseOptions.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Fields can be assigned with corresponding 'set' methods. Returns a DatabaseOptions instance upon invoking build().

    The following is a usage example:
    DatabaseOptions options = new DatabaseOptions.Builder("storageClass").setMaxSpace(20).build();

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Builder​(java.lang.String storageClass)
      The Builder() constructor will initialize with default values.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Builder

        public Builder​(java.lang.String storageClass)
        The Builder() constructor will initialize with default values. Use the corresponding "setter" methods to modify the fields according to need.
        Parameters:
        storageClass - A string representing the storage class name.

    • Method Detail

      • setMaxSpace

        public DatabaseOptions.Builder setMaxSpace​(int maxSpace)
        Optional setter method for maxSpace.
        Parameters:
        maxSpace - An integer value that specifies the maximum size for the database in MB. Default is 10.
        Returns:
        A Builder instance.

      • setAvgDocSize

        public DatabaseOptions.Builder setAvgDocSize​(int avgDocSize)
        Optional setter method for average document size.
        Parameters:
        avgDocSize - An integer value that specifies the average size of all documents in the database in bytes. Default is 32768.
        Returns:
        A Builder instance.

      • setUpdatePercent

        public DatabaseOptions.Builder setUpdatePercent​(int updatePercent)
        Optional setter method for update percentage.
        Parameters:
        updatePercent - An integer value that specifies the percentage of update requests compared to insertion and deletion requests. Default is 5.
        Returns:
        A Builder instance.

      • setLogOptions

        public DatabaseOptions.Builder setLogOptions​(LogOptions logOption)
        Optional setter method for LogOptions.
        Parameters:
        logOption - An Enum that represent database recoverability options non-recoverable. Default is LogOptions.NONE
        Returns:
        A Builder instance.

        public DatabaseOptions.Builder setOrderedIndexEnabled​(boolean orderedIndexEnabled)
        Optional setter method for ordered index.
        Parameters:
        orderedIndexEnabled - A boolean that represents whether the index is ordered. Default is false.
        Returns:
        A Builder instance.

      • setLogStreamId

        public DatabaseOptions.Builder setLogStreamId​(java.lang.String logStreamId)
        Optional setter method for a Log stream ID; Note that a valid logStream ID must be set if a recoverable database is defined with LogOptions.ALL.
        Parameters:
        logStreamId - The Log Stream ID. Default is null.
        Returns:
        A Builder instance.

      • build

        public DatabaseOptions build()
                      throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Validates and builds a DatabaseOptions instance from the current state of the Builder.
        Returns:
        A DatabaseOptions instance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If any options are invalid or ill-formatted.
